price: Enti Yεbrεε mframa ase maa no; εbͻͻ bͻkͻͻ wͻ ne nhyε mu wͻ faako a ͻpε (sε mframa no mͻ nkͻ) biara,
arabic: فَسَخَّرۡنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيۡثُ أَصَابَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fasakharnā lahu al-rīḥa tajrī bi-amrihi rukhāan ḥaythu aṣāba
